name: Skullz Tombz
description:
The bat needs your help to get out of the tomb. Move the bones to unblock the way. Just slide them in the new position, but horizontal bones can only move horizontally and vertical ones can only move in vertical direction.
A puzzle game with endless fun and countless puzzles. In the easy level section there are 7000 challenging tasks. The medium level section covers 4000 puzzles to solve. The hard level section has 1500 puzzles and the expert section another 800. Enough puzzles for a very long time.
